msg: THRIFT-373. Include js and as3 libraries in release tarballs

author: ppoddar
msg: OPENJPA-1663,OPENJPA-1664: Add support to target find() or query to a subset of slices with plug-in policy. The existing, code intrusive mechanism of setting hints on query/fetch plan explicitly is retained. Intrusive, explicit setting of targets overrides policy based targets.
